IntroSection.title: THIS IS US.
IntroSection.description: Bl4cklist is a general coding & tech Discord server with a main focus on Discord bots and offers its own programming courses.
IntroSection.description2: But we have even more: Spend your time chatting with our loving community, make new friends or just relax and enjoy all kinds of news from the gaming world - we want to connect the most diverse Discord server communities.
